page.title: 10GAMES WE PLAY - NEW BRIGHTON
page.content: "In the playground I play 'British Bulldog'. This is how you play. One person is 'on' and stands in the middle of the playground. He picks someone else by shouting their name and that person has to run from one side of the playground to the other without being caught. If you are caught you must stand in the middle and become a catcher." {Howard {Haggerty(10)} "At playtime I play 'Flooretta'. The rules of the game are that someone is 'on' and they say something like "Floor jelly-wobbles" or "Floor fire-engine" to the others in the game. If they say, "Floor jelly-wobbles" you have to do a handstand and wobble your legs. Whoever stays up the longest becomes the person who is 'on'."{Edith {Widdas(10)}
